snippet.title: Overthrown - Gameplay Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Here's our teaser trailer for our newest game - Overthrown!
Launching this Fall into Steam Early Access and Game Preview for Xbox Series X/S and PC,

Overthrown is a chaotic city builder where players construct and manage a kingdom either alone in single-player mode or with friends in up to six-player co-op. 

Harness the power of a magical crown to lift and throw anything in the game, defend citizens from bandits and mutants, and farm the land. Build, gather resources, explore, and farm to turn a fledgling state into a commanding, self-sustaining kingdom.

Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1133500/Overthrown/

#gaming #citybuilder #indiegame #gametrailer #trailer #newgame #coopgames #coop #XBOX #PS5 #PC #Steam #coopgame #survivalgame
